Email

Contact Us
Questions or interested in booking a tour? Send us your contact details and we’ll be in touch.

About Us
Manufactured Home Communities That Offer an Attainable Way of Life
Bedrock Communities is an owner and operator of manufacturing housing communities in the Southeast US. Our communities provide unmatched experiences that enhance the lifestyles of all our residents through affordable housing options that deliver attainable value with well appointed amenities and exceptional service.
Welcome home!
All Age and Active 55+ Communities
We offer neighborhood types for all residents, including
55+ Communities
and
All-Age Communities
, perfect for families, these are all designed with our residents in mind, adding additional features that cater to most needs.
Amenities
Our communities boast a variety of amenities to enhance your lifestyle. From heated, Olympic-sized pools and shuffle board courts, to fitness centers and community planned social activities, no detail has been overlooked, creating an exceptional home environment that our residents truly find comforting.
Premier Locations
Many of our charming neighborhoods are located within walking distance of Florida’s most sought after beaches and lakes. Living near the water has never been more affordable or attainable!
Pets Allowed
Bedrock understands the comfort and joy pets bring to our lives, which is why we’ve made the majority of our communities are pet friendly. Most offer fenced in areas with equipment for your pets to enjoy, so if that is a requirement, be sure to check for the “Bark Park” icon when looking for your next home!
OUR MISSION
Driven by high standards and a commitment to excellence, we create exceptional value by providing quality affordable housing that enhances the lives of our residents and team members.
CORE VALUES
EXCELLENCE
COLLABORATION
INTEGRITY
RESPECT
Active, Creative Acquisitions Program
Bedrock Communities has the ability to move quickly and creatively in our acquisitions process, and we are actively pursuing new communities.
Our primary focus is on age-restricted manufactured home parks, but we welcome the opportunity to evaluate any property.
